channel.title: Help making my server work less slow
channel.description:
Ok, guys, i have my server online, it doesn't lag but when my character is walking it kinda stucks a bit...and that sucks..
i would like to know how to delete things that make laggy and that worth nothing like elements, or effects, but idk how... and also, i saw at config > npc, that theres A LOT of npcs, and they probably lag, but they have like an order, npc 1: ...npc 2:..., so if i delete npc 2 will that cause an error cuz im breaking the order?, please help.

item.title: Help making my server work less slow
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

Ok, guys, i have my server online, it doesn’t lag but when my character is walking it kinda stucks a bit…and that sucks…

i would like to know how to delete things that make laggy and that worth nothing like elements, or effects, but idk how… and also, i saw at config > npc, that theres A LOT of npcs, and they probably lag, but they have like an order, npc 1: …npc 2:…, so if i delete npc 2 will that cause an error cuz im breaking the order?, please help.
